name: APIC-Collection-of-APIs
description: This is an example application that is used to publish a number of APIs using API Connect

componentTemplate.name: APIC Product Template
componentTemplate.description: An example APIC Product template which allows you to publish or draft a product to APIC

envPropDefs.name: apic.catalog
envPropDefs.label: Catalog Name
envPropDefs.description: The catalog to publish to for this environment

envPropDefs.name: apic.organization
envPropDefs.label: APIC Organization
envPropDefs.description: The organization used for a set of catalogs.  Often DEV and TEST uses the same organization where PROD uses a different organization

propDefs.name: apic.username
propDefs.label: APIC Username
propDefs.description: The username to authenticate with to API Connect

propDefs.name: apic.path
propDefs.label: APIC Toolkit Path
propDefs.description: The path to API Connect Toolkit

propDefs.name: product-yaml-name
propDefs.label: product-yaml-name
propDefs.description: The filename for the product YAML

processes.name: Draft-Product
processes.description: This process will publish the APIs and Products in Draft Mode.  This will make the APIs in that Product visible on the Developer Portal for use by application developers.

edges.to: Publish Product and API in Draft Mode

edges.from: Publish Product and API in Draft Mode

offsets.name: Publish Product and API in Draft Mode

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
pwd && ls -al
echo 'apic.path is ${p:apic.path}'

#
# Publish Product and API in Draft Mode so developers can access APIs in Developer Portal
#
${p:apic.path} draft-products:create --server ${p:apic.server} --org ${p:apic.organization} jgraceivt-product_1.0.1.yaml
echo $?
echo "APIs have been published to Drafts"

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

children.name: Publish Product and API in Draft Mode

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

processes.name: Publish-Product
processes.description: This process will publish the Product and API to a target Catalog

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction
